about_the_game: A powerful Naval Commander who protects your trade routes using the overwhelming firepower of the Imperial Dreadnot - available to unlock and hire in the Soul Tree once an Imperial population of 210 has been met
detailed_description: A powerful Naval Commander who protects your trade routes using the overwhelming firepower of the Imperial Dreadnot - available to unlock and hire in the Soul Tree once an Imperial population of 210 has been met
legal_notice: Bulwark © 2023, published by Wired Productions. The Falconeer is a registered trademark of Tomas Sala. All rights reserved.
name: Bulwark Evolution: Falconeer Chronicles - Dreadnot Day One DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 4th Gen Or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Xe or Nvidia GT1030 or AMD 5830
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i7 6th Gen or AMD Ryzen 5 5500
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Arc A750 or Nvidia GTX 1080 or AMD RX 6700
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 MB available space

short_description: A powerful Naval Commander who protects your trade routes using the overwhelming firepower of the Imperial Dreadnot - available to unlock and hire in the Soul Tree once an Imperial population of 210 has been met
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
